entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shamattawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:13 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 35 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 35 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:11 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:11 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:11 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 08:11 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
